name: Kolle the Hummingbird
description:
Help Kolle, the hyperactive hummingbird, escape starvation!

Try to keep the nectar level above zero by sucking all the juicy substance out of the nearby plants. But look out, the more he enjoys his meal the hastier he becomes.

Flap your wings by hitting the f and j key simultaneously to go up or just one of them for a direction. On mobile use the arcade buttons to get the little guy going. Always keep him above the ground and beware of lurking frogs.

Art: Geethnius & Mad_Moerges
Code/Audio: ko1N
